## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                            | Type                            | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `active`      | `active`       | Property to set the active status                      | `boolean`                       | `false`     |
| `badge`       | `badge`        | Optional property to enable/set badge                  | `string \| undefined`           | `undefined` |
| `badgeRadius` | `badge-radius` | Optional property to set badge border radius (ex. 8px) | `string \| undefined`           | `'6px'`     |
| `disabled`    | `disabled`     | Optional property to set the disabled status           | `boolean \| undefined`          | `undefined` |
| `headerTitle` | `header-title` | Property to set the header title                       | `string`                        | `undefined` |
| `tabId`       | `tab-id`       | Optional property to set ID                            | `number \| string \| undefined` | `undefined` |
